description:
Learn about IBM and RedHat → https://ibm.biz/BdmVuc

Join E.G. Nadhan, Red Hat's Global Chief Architect, and Kyle Brown, IBM Fellow and CTO for the CIO at IBM, as they go through a framework used at IBM to help simplify the IT landscape through automation, containerization, and effective data management all the way to artificial intelligence. Learn how these innovations can benefit decision-makers, developers, and operators alike. 

Keep up with the next era of hybrid multicloud solutions through the latest news, tools and thought leadership → https://ibm.biz/BdmVuB

#redhat  #ibm  #automation  #itstrategy
title: IT complexity simplification framework
